node.newshortdescriptions:
30 Minute Virtual Coaching Session
Private and virtual training sessions with Danny are scheduled through Acuity Scheduling. Click the Schedule button to schedule your session.
node.longdescription: Working with Danny is one of the best ways to master your technique! Whether you are following up from an in-person private session, Workshop or want some personal feedback from Danny, he's available to meet with you where ever you are virtually. How it works: Danny asks you send a video recording of yourself running (you'll receive directions on how to do so). Before your session, he'll review your form so he can provide feedback during your Lesson. You'll have the opportunity to ask any questions you may have and make the session unique to your needs!

node.newshortdescriptions:

node.newshortdescriptions:
1 Hour in Asheville, NC
Private and virtual training sessions with Danny are scheduled through Acuity Scheduling. Click the Schedule button to schedule your session.
node.longdescription: Taking a personal training session with Danny is a once-in-a-lifetime experience. His 40+ years of running experience combined with his supportive teaching style will transform your fitness and your life! Danny teaches walkers, walk-runners, and runners of all levels. Danny teaches in Asheville all year round and also teaches Private Sessions in cities or locations where he is leading his Workshops.|

node.productname: Marathon Digital Training Programs - Powered by Final Surge
node.recommendedproductname: ChiRunning Marathon Digital Training Program (powered by FinalSurge)
node.newshortdescriptions: Training program is available through FinalSurge. Click the Shop with Final Surge button to purchase this training program.
node.longdescription: Meet the ultimate marathon training program – combining the proven ChiRunning technique with the safest and most effective training strategies for your marathon. Use this unique, five phase format to learn the foundation of the ChiRunning technique in manageable, weekly lessons, followed by long distance form practice to build aerobic and cardiovascular capacity, and a mastery phase where you’ll practice specific aspects of your event and overcoming obstacles to your success.
